name: Medieval Defence
description:
Medieval Defense is a real-time strategy game with RPG elements.

You have to protect the main building from the invasion of orcs and the undead, using
his brave army, rebuilding buildings and strengthening the defenses around the kingdom. Automatic towers
with crossbows, powerful cannons and magic crystals - all this is your future fortress, which will not
the enemy to approach at least one step to your possessions.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Pumping towers.
- Random generation of waves.
